sqlMap.select: SELECT res.id AS sresID, pres.id AS presID, res.*, pres.* FROM msRunSearchResult AS res, PercolatorResult AS pres WHERE pres.id = #id# AND pres.resultID = res.id

SELECT res.id AS sresID, pres.id AS presID, res.*, pres.* FROM msRunSearchResult AS res, PercolatorResult AS pres WHERE res.id = #searchResultId# AND pres.resultID = res.id AND pres.runSearchAnalysisID = #runSearchAnalysisId#

SELECT res.id AS sresID, pres.id AS presID, res.*, pres.* FROM msRunSearchResult AS res, PercolatorResult AS pres, msRunSearchAnalysis AS rsa WHERE res.id = #searchResultId# AND pres.resultID = res.id AND pres.runSearchAnalysisID = rsa.id AND rsa.searchAnalysisID = #searchAnalysisId#
SELECT id FROM PercolatorResult WHERE runSearchAnalysisID=#runSearchAnalysisId#
SELECT id FROM PercolatorResult WHERE runSearchAnalysisID=#runSearchAnalysisId# ORDER BY resultID LIMIT #offset#, #limit#
SELECT pres.id FROM msRunSearchResult AS res, PercolatorResult AS pres WHERE pres.runSearchAnalysisID=#runSearchAnalysisId# AND pres.resultID = res.id AND res.scanID = #scanId#
SELECT pres.id FROM PercolatorResult AS pres, msRunSearchAnalysis as rsa WHERE pres.runSearchAnalysisID = rsa.id AND rsa.searchAnalysisID = #analysisId#
SELECT pres.id FROM PercolatorResult AS pres, msRunSearchAnalysis as rsa WHERE pres.runSearchAnalysisID = rsa.id AND rsa.searchAnalysisID = #searchAnalyisId# ORDER BY resultID LIMIT #offset#, #limit#
SELECT count(*) FROM PercolatorResult WHERE runSearchAnalysisID=#runSearchAnalysisId#
SELECT count(*) FROM PercolatorResult AS pres, msRunSearchAnalysis AS rsa WHERE rsa.searchAnalysisID=#searchAnalysisId# AND pres.runSearchAnalysisID = rsa.id
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PercolatorResult (resultID, runSearchAnalysisID, qvalue, pep, discriminantScore, pvalue, predictedRetentionTime, peptideResultID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
INSERT INTO PercolatorResult (resultID, runSearchAnalysisID, qvalue, pep, discriminantScore, pvalue, predictedRetentionTime) VALUES $values$
